description.value:
AccessVarisian ethnicity or New Thassilon nationality

You have tattoos on your body corresponding to one of the ancient Thassilonian schools of magic. Choose one of the following schools of magic: abjuration (@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Shield]{Shield}), conjuration (@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Tanglefoot]{Tanglefoot}), enchantment (@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Daze]{Daze}), evocation (@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Electric Arc]{Electric Arc}), illusion (@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Ghost Sound]{Ghost Sound}), necromancy (@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Chill Touch]{Chill Touch}), or transmutation (@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Sigil]{Sigil}). You can cast the associated cantrip (listed in parentheses) as an innate arcane spell at will.
